Package org.jcatapult.mvc.action

Interface Summary
ActionInvocation This interface defines the information about an action invocation.
ActionInvocationStore This class defines the mechanism used to locate action invocation objects.
ActionInvocationWorkflow This interface defines how actions are invoked by the JCatapult MVC.
ActionMapper This interface defines the method that maps URIs to actions.
ActionMappingWorkflow This class defines the workflow process that uses the incoming request URI to determine the action to invoke.
ActionPrepareWorkflow This class defines a workflow that is used to prepare an action to have parameters set onto it and also to be invoked.
 

Class Summary
DefaultActionInvocation This class is the default action invocation implementation.
DefaultActionInvocationStore This class is the default action invocation store.
DefaultActionInvocationWorkflow This class is the default implementation of the action invocation workflow.
DefaultActionMapper This class is the defult action mapper implementation.
DefaultActionMappingWorkflow This class is the default implementation of the ActionWorkflow.
DefaultActionPrepareWorkflow This implements the action prepare workflow and invokes any method that is annotated with the @PrepareMethod annotation.
